Rainforest Studio

Lab without walls: where experiments meet everyday life. We prototype culture + AI with care, humour, and community spirit — rooted in Haringey, open to the world.

Explore Threads of Memory Read Lab Notes About the Lab

What we’re building

  • Threads of Memory — an immersive arts experiment weaving local textile heritage with sound + spatial media.
  • Culture x Tech — playful prototypes that make new tools feel human, inclusive, and locally useful.
  • Lab Notes — open work‑in‑progress so others can follow, learn, and remix.

Why it matters

  • Artist‑led prototyping with community voices.
  • Accessibility from the start (lo‑fi to hi‑fi; screen‑reader‑friendly docs; alt text on media).
  • Open knowledge: we publish methods, learnings, and templates.
  • Joy + humanity: we believe technology should feel playful, caring, and made for people — not just systems.

Get involved
